problem.p: Can the string value of ‘Key’ be prefixed with :aws:”?
How are the EBS snapshots saved on Amazon S3?

choicegroup.choice: EBS snapshots are not stored in the Amazon S3

problem.p: The new DB Instance that is created when you promote a Read Replica retains the backup window period.
Which of the following features ensures even distribution of traffic to Amazon EC2 instances in multiple Availability Zones registered with a load balancer?

choicegroup.choice: An Amazon Route 53 weighted routing policy
Elastic Load Balancing cross-zone load balancing
An Amazon Route 53 latency routing policy

problem.p: What is the type of monitoring data (for Amazon EBS volumes) which is available automatically in 5-minute periods at no charge called?
Because of the extensibility limitations of striped storage attached to Windows Server, Amazon RDS does not currently support increasing storage on a _____ DB Instance.
Amazon EC2 has no Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) because you can’t specify a particular Amazon EC2 resource in an IAM policy.
Select the correct statement:

choicegroup.choice: You don’t need not specify the resource identifier while stopping a resource
You can terminate, stop, or delete a resource based solely on its tags
You can’t terminate, stop, or delete a resource based solely on its tags
You don’t need to specify the resource identifier while terminating a resource

problem.p: Is the encryption of connections between my application and my DB Instance using SSL for the MySQL server engines available?
Select the incorrect statement

choicegroup.choice: In Amazon EC2, the private IP addresses only returned to Amazon EC2 when the instance is stopped or terminated
In Amazon VPC, an instance retains its private IP addresses when the instance is stopped.
In Amazon VPC, an instance does NOT retain its private IP addresses when the instance is stopped.
In Amazon EC2, the private IP address is associated exclusively with the instance for its lifetime

problem.p: Can I delete a snapshot of the root device of an EBS volume used by a registered AMI?
A group can contain many users. Can a user belong to multiple groups?

choicegroup.choice: Yes but only if they are using two factor authentication

problem.p: Please select the most correct answer regarding the persistence of the Amazon Instance Store

choicegroup.choice: The data on an instance store volume persists only during the life of the associated Amazon EC2 instance
The data on an instance store volume is lost when the security group rule of the associated instance is changed.
The data on an instance store volume persists even after associated Amazon EC2 instance is deleted

problem.p: You are using an m1.small EC2 Instance with one 300 GB EBS volume to host a relational database. You determined that write throughput to the database needs to be increased. Which of the following approaches can help achieve this? Choose 2 answers

choiceresponse.choice: Use an array of EBS volumes.
Place the instance in an Auto Scaling Groups
Add an EBS volume and place into RAID 5.
Increase the size of the EC2 Instance.
Put the database behind an Elastic Load Balancer.

problem.p: Which AWS instance address has the following characteristics? :”If you stop an instance, its Elastic IP address is unmapped, and you must remap it when you restart the instance.”
True or False: Common points of failures like generators and cooling equipment are shared across Availability Zones.
Can I test my DB Instance against a new version before upgrading?
Security groups act like a firewall at the instance level, whereas ____________ are an additional layer of security that act at the subnet level.
True or False: If you add a tag that has the same key as an existing tag on a DB Instance, the new value overwrites the old value.
Multi-AZ deployment ___________ supported for Microsoft SQL Server DB Instances.
Fill in the blanks: “To ensure failover capabilities, consider using a _____ for incoming traffic on a network interface”.
If I have multiple Read Replicas for my master DB Instance and I promote one of them, what happens to the rest of the Read Replicas?

choicegroup.choice: The remaining Read Replicas will still replicate from the older master DB Instance
The remaining Read Replicas will be deleted
The remaining Read Replicas will be combined to one read replica

problem.p: Can I encrypt connections between my application and my DB Instance using SSL?
What does Amazon CloudFormation provide?

choicegroup.choice: The ability to setup Autoscaling for Amazon EC2 instances.
A templated resource creation for Amazon Web Services.
A template to map network resources for Amazon Web Services.

problem.p: Can I use Provisioned IOPS with VPC?
What are the four levels of AWS Premium Support?
Making your snapshot public shares all snapshot data with everyone. Can the snapshots with AWS Marketplace product codes be made public?
Can I initiate a “forced failover” for my MySQL Multi-AZ DB Instance deployment?
What happens when you create a topic on Amazon SNS?

choicegroup.choice: The topic is created, and it has the name you specified for it.
An ARN (Amazon Resource Name) is created.
You can create a topic on Amazon SQS, not on Amazon SNS.

problem.p: Through which of the following interfaces is AWS Identity and Access Management available? A) AWS Management Console B) Command line interface (CLI) C) IAM Query API D) Existing libraries
